css._notice_: This section is for manually disabling/enabling features.
css._emulateMacOS_comment: This enables various adjustments that make the Apple Music interface look like the MacOS Apple Music UI. Enabling rightAlign will replicate the Windows Operating System's Window Control.

preferences._notice_: This is the basic user preferences. Modify to your liking below.
preferences._cssTheme_comment: If you are using a custom CSS theme, set it below, otherwise leave empty.
preferences._closeButtonMinimize_comment: Should the close button minimize your apple music (true) or should it quit the app (false). (true by default)
preferences._discordRPC_comment: Enable/Disable Discord Rich Presence. (true by default)
preferences._playbackNotifications_comment: Enabling this means you will get notifications when you change song. The minimized option forces notifications to only appear if the app is hidden / minimized.
preferences._trayTooltipSongName_comment: Enabling this option allows you to see the song name in the tooltip on the taskbar when the application is minimized to the tray.
